review: *** ******* **** *** **** * **** **** ******* Great personality, very professional and reassuring. We can't even begin to describe our gratitude. She made what seemed impossible into glorious reality. Thank you for her positive attitude, understanding, encouragement and compassion. She ia having a very good team including Rekha, Deepika and others who are also very supportive. Good thing is they are having a dedicated support line which make patients feel connected with them very time. Overall we highly recommend Dr. Deepthi and her team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After struggling 5 years with infertility because of pcos after visiting many doctors underwent many checkups and taking lots of medicines were make me more sick. The first meeting with Dr deeptinbawa madam itself create new hope in my life. She suggest me a diet and excercise routine in which I lost 5 kgs in a month. Within a three month I was concieved. Me and my family very much greatfull to this doctor and her team. And I highly recommend this doctor as well as the hospital for the better treatment. Thank you doctor.
She is a very dedicated doctor towards her patient,she understands the pain the patient is going through, listens to every point *** ***** **** ********* ** *** *******

Doctor is very genuine. She has a very good team which makes the process much easy for the patient to take.Especially Mrs.Rekha make us feel more comfortable to take the procedure.

Very easy going. Dr explained us the details very well, no unnecessary investigations and gave precise solutions. Dr made the procedure and consultations Very comfortable. Overall experience is excellent. More importantly, Dr's team is very good.
